CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Furthermore , anthracene - based copolymers usually exhibit high crystallinity and high charge carrier mobility due to the coplanar fused structure of the anthracene unit.

Let's think step by step.

1. Anthracene
2. Anthracene-based copolymers.

Both "anthracene" and "anthracene-based copolymers" are material names mentioned in the paragraph. Anthracene is a specific type of organic compound, and anthracene-based copolymers are a type of polymer material where anthracene units are part of the polymer structure.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. Anthracene
2. Anthracene-based copolymers.

These are the only entities in the paragraph that can be clearly identified as material names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
